greeting_downtown: Hey, choomba. Welcome to the concrete jungle.
Another day in Cyber City. Stay sharp.
greeting_uptown: Quiet up here. Good place to lay low.
greeting_industrial: Watch your back in the industrial district.
quest_giver_intro: Listen up, I got a job for you.
quest_complete: You did it. Here's your cut.
Nice work. The client is satisfied.
